question: Compare the strengths and weaknesses of Diluc and Jean.
answer:
Comparison between Diluc and Jean:

Diluc:
Character: Diluc
Rarity: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Element: Pyro
Weapon: Claymore
Region: Mondstadt

Talents:

Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
Description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Elemental Skill: Searing Onslaught
Description: Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

Elemental Burst: Dawn
Description: Releases intense flames to knock nearby opponents back, dealing Pyro DMG.

Constellations:

C1: Conviction
Effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

C2: Searing Ember
Effect: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.

Jean:
Character: Jean
Rarity: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Element: Anemo
Weapon: Sword
Region: Mondstadt

Talents:

Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework
Description: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Elemental Skill: Gale Blade
Description: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm.

Constellations:

C1: Spiraling Tempest
Effect: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade by 40%.

Character: Diluc
Rarity: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Element: Pyro
Weapon: Claymore
Region: Mondstadt

Talents:

Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
Description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Elemental Skill: Searing Onslaught
Description: Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

Elemental Burst: Dawn
Description: Releases intense flames to knock nearby opponents back, dealing Pyro DMG.

Constellations:

C1: Conviction
Effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

C2: Searing Ember
Effect: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
